title: Dragon scale dust

properties.value: Dragon scale dust is the result of using a pestle and mortar on a blue dragon scale. It is used in Herblore for potions such as weapon poisons and antifire potions. It can be purchased from the Nightmare Zone, using 750 reward points. Note that this store cannot be used by iron men.

Item ID241

Dragon scale dust is the result of using a pestle and mortar on a blue dragon scale. It is used in Herblore for potions such as weapon poisons and antifire potions. It can be purchased from the Nightmare Zone, using 750 reward points. Note that this store cannot be used by iron men.

[[File:Dragon scale dust detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Dragon scale dust''' is the result of using a [[pestle and mortar]] on a [[blue dragon scale]]. It is used in [[Herblore]] for potions such as [[weapon poison]]s and [[antifire potion]]s. It can be purchased from the [[Nightmare Zone]], using 750 reward points. Note that this store cannot be used by iron men.
